conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true isometric/cutaway 3D interior with extruded walls, visible thickness, multiple wall faces, and removed ceiling/roof.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Convincing 3D extrusion with readable wall corners, distinct floor plane, clear interior volume, and clean cutaway; minor perspective/scale stylization but not severe.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout does not match the 2D plan: room zoning/adjoinments differ (kitchen/dining/living partitioning), bathroom and stair placement appear relocated, and a bedroom-like area appears that is not in the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture and fixtures are present (sofa, table, kitchen island, bath fixtures), but several items appear assigned to rooms that do not correspond to the 2D plan (e.g., bedroom inserted; kitchen layout not matching).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with good lighting and clear separation of walls/floor/openings; no UI/text contamination; geometry is readable.

detected_errors.description: Room configuration/adjoinments significantly diverge from the 2D plan (kitchen/dining/living separation and overall partitioning not preserved).
Major elements appear missing/relocated relative to the plan (stair block and bathroom placement do not align; additional bedroom-like space introduced).
Door/window positions and opening logic do not consistently correspond to the 2D plan.

summary: This is a genuine cutaway 3D model, but the generated 3D layout is not geometrically faithful to the 2D plan (room zoning, stairs/bath placement, and openings differ substantially).
